scripts.delswaps: find . -type f \( -name ".*.swp" -o -name ".*.swo" \) -exec rm -f {} + && find . -type d -name ".sass-cache" -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.rmrf: rm -rf dist/* && rm -rf docs && npm run rmuploads
scripts.copyfiles: cp -r src/* dist/super-forms/ && cp -r src/docs docs && sed -i "s:# sourceMappingURL=elements.css.map::g" dist/super-forms/assets/css/frontend/elements.css
scripts.delsass: find dist/ -name "*.sass" -type f -delete && find dist/ -name "*.css.map" -type f -delete
scripts.deldevaddons: npm run deldocs && npm run delwccustom && npm run delfelisting
scripts.copyaddons: cp -r dist/super-forms/add-ons/* dist/ && cp -r dist/super-forms/* dist/super-forms-bundle
scripts.prod: npm run delswaps && npm run rmrf && npm run sass && npm run copyfiles && npm run delsass && npm run copyaddons && npm run zip && rm -rf gitzip* && npm run deldevaddons && npm run delfonts
scripts.old-deldevaddons: npm run delstripe && npm run delwccustom && npm run delfelisting
scripts.old-renamelines-old: npm run delcodes1 && npm run delcodes2 && npm run delcodes3 && npm run dellines1 && npm run dellines2 && npm run dellines3 && sed -i "s:Super Forms - Drag & Drop Form Builder:Super Forms - All In One Bundle:g" dist/super-forms-bundle/super-forms.php
scripts.old-renamelines: npm run delcodes1 && npm run delcodes2 && npm run delcodes3 && npm run dellines1 && npm run dellines2 && npm run dellines3
scripts.old-dev: npm run delswaps && npm run rmrf && npm run sass && npm run copyfiles && npm run copybundle && npm run deladdons && npm run copyaddons && npm run renamelines
scripts.old-minify: npm run delswaps && npm run rmrf && npm run sass && npm run copyfiles && npm run delsass && npm run minifyjs && npm run minifycss && npm run copybundle && npm run deladdons && npm run copyaddons && npm run renamelines && npm run zip
scripts.old-prod-old: npm run delswaps && npm run rmrf && npm run sass && npm run copyfiles && npm run delsass && npm run copybundle && npm run deladdons && npm run copyaddons && npm run renamelines && npm run zip && rm -rf gitzip* && npm run deldevaddons
scripts.old-prod: npm run delswaps && npm run rmrf && npm run sass && npm run copyfiles && npm run delsass && npm run copybundle && npm run copyaddons && npm run renamelines && npm run zip && rm -rf gitzip* && npm run deldevaddons
